Astronomy is the study of the universe and all the things in it. This includes stars, planets, moons, asteroids, and galaxies. Astronomers use special tools like telescopes to look at the universe. Astronomy helps us understand the laws of physics and how the universe works. It also helps us find new planets that might be able to support life. People have been studying the universe for thousands of years, and today we have many different types of astronomers, including those who study the sun, the stars, and the planets.
